info.name: ZiraAI Sponsorship System - Complete v6.0
info.description:
Complete Sponsorship Link Distribution System API Collection

**Implementation Date**: August 19, 2025
**Version**: 6.0.0
**Features**: 50+ endpoints across 9 major service areas

## Major Service Areas:
1. **Core Sponsorship Management** (18 endpoints)
2. **SMS & WhatsApp Integration** (8 endpoints)
3. **Mobile Deep Linking** (6 endpoints)
4. **Analytics & Dashboard** (12 endpoints)
5. **A/B Testing System** (15 endpoints)
6. **Multi-Language Support** (16 endpoints)
7. **Advanced Customization** (14 endpoints)
8. **Security & Fraud Detection** (8 endpoints)
9. **Bulk Operations** (6 endpoints)

## Authentication:
- **Type**: Bearer Token (JWT)
- **Roles**: Sponsor, Admin, Farmer
- **Variable**: {{token}}

## Environment Variables:
- `{{baseUrl}}`: API base URL (e.g., https://api.ziraai.com/api/v1)
- `{{token}}`: JWT authentication token
- `{{sponsorId}}`: Current sponsor ID
- `{{linkId}}`: Sponsorship link ID
- `{{testId}}`: A/B test ID
- `{{analysisId}}`: Plant analysis ID

item.name: 1. Core Sponsorship Management
item.description: Core sponsorship operations including link creation, management, and tracking

    "sponsor_tier": "premium"

  "expiryDate": "2025-09-30T23:59:59Z",

}

item.name: 7. Advanced Customization
item.description: Brand customization, themes, and white-label solutions

request.description: Get complete customization configuration
Update sponsor's customization configuration
Get branding configuration (logos, colors, typography)
